page.title: 09Children's Games,Bitteswell
page.content: { SHED CATCH:}This is a game for 4-10 people played around our shed.Four metres away there is a long slab.One person is on,the others go round the shed. The game is played by the people trying to get over the line without being caught.They do not run around the shed because the 'it' is not allowed past halfway.If someone gets past the line they may go back to help their companions.When you are on (or caught which makes you on) you count up to five so the others can get away. { {VETS:}Around our playground there is a big bush which you can go inside.In it there are three logs which the person acting the animal sits on.There is also a branch which the person acting as the vet sits on. { { (continued on the next page) }
